name: Precise Games
description:
Let's see if you are very precise, especially when playing games. Play with 3 mini games available and be precise. This game is made for the PB Game Jam 6: Minigames. 

Drop Toast:
This game is all about dropping a bread precisely to the toaster, turning it into a toast. Make sure you didn't miss 3 times or it is game over

Robot Jet:
This game is like flappy bird, but with a robot. And the gap is almost as big as the robot. I'd say this is the hardest game of all, because it requires a lot of precision on when to boost yourself and when not to.

House Blocker:
This game is all about protecting your home from getting shot by giant arrows. You won't know where they will be coming from, but the one thing you know is that their aim is precisely to your house. 

Credits:

  • Custom Construct Loader (https://github.com/hcatarrunas/HCG/tree/master/ConstructFiles/Intros)
  • Game Title (http://www.webestools.com/web20-title-generator-logo-title-maker-online-web20-ef...)
